name: PropRise
long_description:
PropRise builds AI software that helps commercial real estate teams find and analyze more deals. Our two products:

Beacon helps self-storage investors find ideal markets and deals matching thier buy box criteria nationwide. Used by Public Storage and other institutional investors.

Primer turns OMs, rent rolls, and T-12s into your exact Excel model in minutes. No more copy-pasting from PDFs. Every data point cited to source. When the OM says one revenue figure and the financials say another, Primer flags the conflict and lets you choose. Teams at Monday Properties, LRE, Boardwalk Storage, Colliers, and  Lee & Associates now underwrite 3x faster.

We support multifamily, self-storage, industrial, retail, and hospitality. Primer is live in 48 hours with 98%+ accuracy.
one_liner: AI-Powered Deal Sourcing & Underwriting for CRE
